jobs.title: AIML Intern
jobs.shortDescription: Work on cutting-edge AI/ML projects and research with hands-on experience in machine learning, deep learning, and LLMs.
jobs.description: Thank you for your interest in the AI/ML Internship role at Trizen Ventures LLP! We are looking for dedicated and passionate individuals to work on cutting-edge projects in Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, and related domains. This is a full-time, hybrid, 2-3 months paid internship opportunity. Please ensure you fill out this application form accurately. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. To learn more about our company, visit our website: www.trizenventures.com
requirements: Knowledge of Machine Learning (ML) and Deep Learning (DL) algorithms
Experience with Large Language Models (LLMs) and their applications
Proficiency in Python and its libraries/frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, NumPy, Pandas)
Research and academic writing skills, including experience in paper publishing
Familiarity with the latest AI tools and technologies
Dedication to full-time hybrid work
responsibilities: Work on cutting-edge AI/ML projects and research
Develop and implement machine learning models
Research and experiment with Large Language Models
Contribute to academic writing and paper publishing
Collaborate with the team on innovative AI solutions
Stay updated with the latest AI tools and technologies
benefits: Hands-on experience with cutting-edge AI/ML technologies
Opportunity to work on real-world projects
selectionProcess: Candidates will have 2 rounds of selection
Assignment round and upon selecting from that round an Interview round

jobs.title: MERN Stack Developer Intern
jobs.shortDescription: Build modern web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js with hands-on experience in full-stack development.
jobs.description: Thank you for your interest in the MERN Stack Developer Internship at Trizen Ventures LLP! We are looking for dedicated and skilled developers to work on cutting-edge web application projects using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). This is a full-time, hybrid, 6 months paid internship opportunity with a monthly stipend of 8K. Possible full-time conversion after 6 months of internship. Please ensure you fill out this application form accurately. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. To learn more about our company, visit our website: www.trizenventures.com
requirements: Only 2023, 2024, and 2025 graduates are eligible to apply
Proficiency in MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js
Experience in secure web application development
Strong problem-solving and debugging skills
Knowledge of role-based access control, authentication, and version management
Familiarity with RESTful APIs, Single Sign-On (SSO), and HRMS integration is a plus
Experience with vibe coding and collaborative development
React Native experience is a plus
Dedication to full-time hybrid work
responsibilities: Develop and maintain web applications using MERN stack
Implement secure authentication and authorization systems
Create and integrate RESTful APIs
Work with databases and data management
Collaborate with team members on project development
Debug and troubleshoot application issues
Participate in code reviews and best practices
benefits: 6 months paid internship with 8K monthly stipend
Possible full-time conversion after 6 months of internship
Hands-on experience with modern web technologies
Opportunity to work on real-world projects
selectionProcess: Candidates will have 2 rounds of selection
Assignment round and upon selecting from that round an Interview round

jobs.title: Social Media Manager
jobs.shortDescription: Create compelling content and manage our social media presence across all platforms to build brand awareness and engage with our community.
jobs.description: We are looking for a creative and dynamic Social Media Manager to handle our company's social media presence and engage with our community. This role involves creating compelling content, managing social media campaigns, and building our brand presence across various platforms. This is a full-time, hybrid position with opportunities for growth and development. To learn more about our company, visit our website: www.trizenventures.com
requirements: Proven experience in social media management and content creation
Strong understanding of social media platforms (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Creative thinking and ability to create engaging content
Knowledge of social media analytics and reporting tools
Experience with graphic design tools (Canva, Adobe Creative Suite) is a plus
Understanding of AI/ML industry trends and terminology
responsibilities: Develop and execute social media strategies across all platforms
Create engaging content including posts, graphics, and videos
Manage and grow our social media community
Monitor social media analytics and provide regular reports
Engage with followers and respond to comments and messages
Collaborate with the team to align social media with company goals
Stay updated with social media trends and best practices
benefits: Opportunity to shape our brand voice
selectionProcess: Candidates will have 2 rounds of selection
Assignment round and upon selecting from that round an Interview round
